body:
Comment 9: 
I have the code saved as cstring.go.  I've run with:
$> go run cstring.go
or
$> go build cstring.go
and run the .exe

Both result in the same behavior.

WERDataCollectionFailure.txt contains:
DefaultDataCollection failed: 0x8007012b
